effect.name: Cut-Off Alpha Test (Texture)
effect.description:
This shader gives the effect of pre-rendered sprites, but with monoalpha, which means that the closer the color is to being transparent, the darker it becomes, and when the color is to be completely transparent, alpha is activated to "cut" it.
Last Updated: 2026-01-04 22:02
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Premultiplied To Straight Alpha (Texture) Shader | 1.0 (13.11.2025) */
parameter.description: This shader gives the effect of pre-rendered sprites, but with monoalpha, which means that the closer the color is to being transparent, the darker it becomes, and when the color is to be completely transparent, alpha is activated to "cut" it.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.
